text: @realDonaldTrump No, reasonable people want to correct the things that are going wrong in Police departments across this nation. Fucking idiot - that's as stupid as your "testing causes COVID19 cases" line. What scares me is that there are people as fucking stupid as YOU who believe your bullshit
